description: Try this lemon delicious pudding for an easy dessert made using simple pantry items. You'll be going back for seconds of this fluffy, zesty sweet treat.
keywords: Pudding,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Lemon,Sesame free,Baking,Halal,Soy free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Easy Lemon Delicious Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180°C/160°C fanforced. Grease an 8-cup capacity square ovenproof dish (see Tip).
Place butter, 1 tbs zest, juice, caster sugar, egg yolks and flour in a large bowl. Whisk to combine. Gradually stir in milk, beating with a wooden spoon until mixture is smooth and combined.
Using an electric mixer, beat egg whites until soft peaks form. Fold egg whites into flour mixture, in two batches. Spoon mixture into dish.
Place ovenproof dish in a large baking dish. Add enough boiling water to a large baking dish to come halfway up the sides of ovenproof dish.

HowToTip.tipText: This pudding needs to be served straight from the oven or the pudding will absorb the sauce.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 40 minutes or until the top is golden and just firm to the touch. Dust with icing sugar and top with cream and remaining zest. Serve immediately (see Tip).
